name: poeticmetric
description: PoeticMetric is a privacy-friendly, self-hosted web analytics platform. It tracks visits without cookies, focusing on privacy and lightweight performance insights with a clean UI.
features: Cookie-free tracking: Monitor website visitors without cookies for privacy compliance.
Privacy-first design: Collect only essential metrics without personal data or fingerprinting.
Real-time analytics: View live visitor data and traffic patterns as they happen.
Page views tracking: Monitor which pages are visited most frequently and engagement metrics.
Referrer analysis: See where traffic originates from with detailed source breakdowns.
Device statistics: Understand audience with breakdowns by device type, browser, and OS.
Geographic data: View visitor locations by country without compromising individual privacy.
Event tracking: Track custom events and user interactions for conversion analysis.
Lightweight script: Minimal tracking code ensures fast page loads and good performance.
Dashboard interface: Clean, intuitive dashboard displays key metrics at a glance.
Multiple sites: Manage analytics for multiple websites from a single installation.
GDPR compliant: Built-in privacy features ensure compliance with data protection regulations.
